name: Digital Library Template - Notion
description: Digital Library Notion template is the ultimate tool for book lovers and avid readers! This template is designed to help you keep track of your reading progress, organize your notes, and discover new books to add to your reading list.You'll get:Built-in reading time tracker and a progress tracker for each book.Note-taking system to store and organize notes from each book and revisit them quickly.Add books to the wishlist, mark them as favorites, or archive them.Add customizable widgets to show t
features: Built-inreading time trackerandaprogress trackerfor each book.; Note-taking system to store and organize notes from each book and revisit them quickly.; Add books to the wishlist, mark them as favorites, or archive them.; Add customizable widgets to show the total books, books read, etc.; Clean and intuitive design.
